name: efferent-dicom
description: DICOM parser/writer for browser and Node.js

scripts.build:node:esm: tsup src/index.node.ts --format esm --target es2020 --out-dir dist/node --sourcemap --clean --tsconfig tsconfig.node.esm.json
scripts.build:node:cjs: tsup src/index.node.ts --format cjs --target es2020 --out-dir dist/node --sourcemap --clean --tsconfig tsconfig.node.cjs.json
scripts.build:node: npm run build:node:esm && npm run build:node:cjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:browser && npm run minify:browser && npm run build:node
